You can do a lot with R Markdown, and [it will stick around](https://yihui.org/en/2022/04/quarto-r-markdown/). But the future of document preparation for R users is [Quarto](https://quarto.org/).

## Learning objectives

* Customized code chunk output
* Control figure size, scale, captions
* Cross-reference figures, tables, and sections
* Insert citations to automatically generate formatted bibliographies

## Pre-meeting

To prepare for this class meeting, please do the following:

* Install [Quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/)
* Read [Quarto demo slides](https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/revealjs/demo/#/title-slide)
